in a way that relates to the curing of a disease or medical condition: These drugs are therapeutically effective in the treatment of skin diseases such as acne. It is one of the safest therapeutically active substances known to man.
More examplesFewer examplesThe hormone has been therapeutically available since it was first isolated in 1935. Aloe vera has been therapeutically used in the treatment of burns and wounds for centuries. These newer products are therapeutically equivalent to the original drug.Acupuncture can be a therapeutically beneficial treatment for patients suffering from chronic arthritis.
